channel.title: [317] Sedex
channel.description:
[center][color=#111111][size=2][URL=http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Sedex/][IMG]http://img861.imageshack.us/img861/7163/sedexbanner.png[/img][/URL][/center] Well why should you play[B] Sedex[/B]? First off I am 100% non-profit all of it goes straight to the server. Secondly I listen to all players I make sure to hear all suggestions and try to add them into the game. I can guarantee to each and every person reading this that this server won't go down in a matter of days. We already are 5+ months online, and are now VPS hosted. This server went through a large amount of updates since going online from new mini-games to new content. As you're reading this I hope that you will join my server and have a wonderful time.
[center][b][size=12pt]Look At The Bottom Comment For Pics/Videos![/size][/b][/center]
[center][size=large][b]Home Page: [url=http://www.sedexrsps.com]Sedex - Main Site[/url] Forums: [url=http://sedexrsps.com/Forums/index.php]Sedex - Forums[/url] [color=#111111][font=Arial]WebClient: [url=http://sedexrsps.com/Play/Webclient.html]Sedex - Client[/url][/b][/center]
[center][size=large][b]Bosses[/b][/size] Kalphite Queen King Black Dragon Barrelchest Ice-Queen Tormented Demons Nomad Chaos Elemental Giant Mole Corporeal Beast Jad Godwars Daggonth Kings[/center]
[center][size=large][b]Minigames[/b][/size] [color=#006400]Barrows Pest Control Fight Pits RFD Duel Arena Warrior Guild Crystal Minigame[/center]
[center][SIZE=4][b]Features[/b][/SIZE] [color=#006400]New Bosses New Staffzone (Nothing there, so staff have no advantage) Access to Armadyl fixed with ::armadyl command Funpk added Improved drop rates on all npc and custom drops added Spec on GS's, Claws and all that fun stuff Overloads work (Making and drinking) New npcs at home and allover Sedex Skills go up to 105 Took stuff of out shop and put new things in Prices changed to keep eco-stable (Must work to get items) XP rates increased on some of those tough to train skills Put banks in some areas for easy banking Mage of Zammy put into skilling so people wont get pked Vengeance and Vengeance Other works Leech prayers work All skills trainable Pets Clan Chat fixed up Custom Skilling Area Balanced Chaotics and Dragon Claws Amazing and Friendly staff So far updated every single day since server has been out (yes I should listen to my own players and take a break) Duel Arena works New dragons added to make slayer easier Santa works 100% (will be on X-Mas) Dicing just like Runescape GWD like Runescape NPC's attack you if you do not have the right god armor Woodcutting trees makes them turn into stumps Way better Firemaking than the Pi one[/center]
[center]Anyway guys if you want to see just log in and try out for yourselves Credits: 85%- HybridPvpv3 14%- My own players for suggestions (Thanks guys, without you. The server would be a piece of crap) 1%- Me doing those suggestions - All editing was done on Paint so if it looks bad it's Paint's fault[/center]

There is several things that are unique which I created and did not release. You can hop on and look around.

item.title: [317] Sedex
item.dc:creator: @omgitsbob12 omgitsbob12
item.description:
@omgitsbob12 wrote:

Thanks for the replies guys, now I can put the update log.
[center][size=12pt]Update Log[/size][/center]
Updates as of 05-21-12:
-All skills go to 105 (called “Mastery” in-game)
-Bank Pins
-Nomad
-Runescape dicing
-24/7 Vps
-Woodcutting with stumps
-Ice queen
-Extreme pot drinking and making
-Overload making
-Diango resets combat levels
-Announcing staff login
-Announcing getting skills to 105
-Buy X
-Max Cape, Veteran cape and Complitionist cape
-Clipped following
Updates as of 28-06-2012:
-Npc kills shop
-Spirit Shield effects
-Chaos Elemental
-Brawling Gloves
-New Agility course
-Improved firemaking
-XP rates lowered
-Player Owned shops
-RFD minigame
-Slayer point system
Updates as of 17-07-2012:
-602 Skill tab
-Tokkul system
-New Tzhaar monsters added
Updates as of 18-07-2012:
-Loyalty titles (rs ones and custom ones)
Updates as of 19-07-2012:
-New Context Menus
-Removed the DSPK achievment tab and added a custom one
-Steadfast, Glavian and Ragefire boots
-Vinewhip + special attack
Updates as of 21-07-2012:
-Elite Slayer tasks (only for people with maxed combat)
-Released the Vine Whip into the economy
-More teleports to the achievement tab
-Huge stability improvement to the server
Updates as of 22-07-2012:
-Items reset when doing animations

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Sedex
item.dc:creator: @omgitsbob12 omgitsbob12
item.description:
@omgitsbob12 wrote:

[center][color=#111111][size=2][/center]
Well why should you play Sedex? First off I am 100% non-profit all of it goes straight to the server. Secondly I listen to all players I make sure to hear all suggestions and try to add them into the game. I can guarantee to each and every person reading this that this server won’t go down in a matter of days. We already are 5+ months online, and are now VPS hosted. This server went through a large amount of updates since going online from new mini-games to new content. As you’re reading this I hope that you will join my server and have a wonderful time.

[center][size=12pt]Look At The Bottom Comment For Pics/Videos![/size][/center]

[center][size=large]Home Page: Sedex - Main Site
Forums: Sedex - Forums
[color=#111111][font=Arial]WebClient: Sedex - Client[/center]

[center][size=large]Bosses[/size]
Kalphite Queen
King Black Dragon
Barrelchest
Ice-Queen
Tormented Demons
Nomad
Chaos Elemental
Giant Mole
Corporeal Beast
Jad
Godwars
Daggonth Kings[/center]

[center][size=large]Minigames[/size]
[color=#006400]Barrows
Pest Control
Fight Pits
RFD
Duel Arena
Warrior Guild
Crystal Minigame[/center]

[center][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE]
[color=#006400]New Bosses
New Staffzone (Nothing there, so staff have no advantage)
Access to Armadyl fixed with ::armadyl command
Funpk added
Improved drop rates on all npc and custom drops added
Spec on GS’s, Claws and all that fun stuff
Overloads work (Making and drinking)
New npcs at home and allover Sedex
Skills go up to 105
Took stuff of out shop and put new things in
Prices changed to keep eco-stable (Must work to get items)
XP rates increased on some of those tough to train skills
Put banks in some areas for easy banking
Mage of Zammy put into skilling so people wont get pked
Vengeance and Vengeance Other works
Leech prayers work
All skills trainable
Pets
Clan Chat fixed up
Custom Skilling Area
Balanced Chaotics and Dragon Claws
Amazing and Friendly staff
So far updated every single day since server has been out (yes I should listen to my own players and take a break)
Duel Arena works
New dragons added to make slayer easier
Santa works 100% (will be on X-Mas)
Dicing just like Runescape
GWD like Runescape NPC’s attack you if you do not have the right god armor
Woodcutting trees makes them turn into stumps
Way better Firemaking than the Pi one[/center]

[center]Anyway guys if you want to see just log in and try out for yourselves
Credits:
85%- HybridPvpv3
14%- My own players for suggestions (Thanks guys, without you. The server would be a piece of crap)
1%- Me doing those suggestions

  • All editing was done on Paint so if it looks bad it’s Paint’s fault[/center]
